attributes.action: Further financial assistance to the wedding industry during covid
attributes.additional_details: To protect the independent businesses within the UK suppling the wedding industry, The wedding industry has 139,000 small businesses, worth £14.7 billion to the UK economy and employees around 500,000 people. According to reports the industry as a whole is set to loose £5.6billion in 2020. Additional financial support will ensure these businesses will be trading following wedding restrictions lifted.
attributes.background: To apply further financial assistance to wedding industry. Weddings have been prominate with strict restrictions, and therefore any company who supplies or relies on more than 80% of their turnover to weddings should be able to gain additional support until restrictions on weddings are lifted.
